titleInfo.title: Singer/Songwriter Night at the Garden Theatre

mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and silver on black) announcing Singer/Songwriter Night benefiting C of C Radio featuring Edwin McCain, Jay Clifford, Danielle Howle, Phillip Lammonds, and Patrick Davis hosted by Mark Bryan at the Garden Theatre on March 28. Poster features a metal photoplate of a microphone.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
